channel.title: [STABLE] Acquittal Remake Beta
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=4]PLEASE READ THE SPOIL UNDER ME BEFORE CONTINUING![/SIZE][/B]
[B][SIZE=4]Ok, Before you start posting on the comments LEACH LEACH! I am not leeching acquittal's server. I am simply hosting it sense it has been down and i liked it when it was up. Yes there was bugs and things still needed to be added, That's when i come in to play. I am going to be hosting and updating this server on a daily basis. All Credits do not go towards me as i did not make this server but i do deserve some because i have been adding stuff to it. Please be respectful and do spam this advertisement thread! Thank you so much and i hope to see you checking this out.
70% Acquittal 30% Me For Adding Stuff/Fixing (may not be accurate but acquittal gets alot is my point)
- Kirkle[/SIZE][/B]
[B][SIZE=4]Download Link / Webclient[/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9zxcsl.png[/img]Download : http://www.mediafire.com/?ciievb4qovqy273 Mirror : http://up.ht/16b0rNJ
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9zxcsl.png[/img]Webclient : http://acquittal.comze.com/index.html [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/vhclya.jpg[/img]Website : http://acquittal.comze.com [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/rmog2g.jpg[/img]Youtube : Coming Soon[/SPOIL]
[B][SIZE=4]Features :[/SIZE][/B] Mage Following Range Following Clipped Projectiles Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Reworked Defence Formulas - PvP Reworked Attack Formulas - PvP & PvN Amazing Switching Rewritten Fishing Gem Cutting Improved Woodcutting Mining Smelting Smithing Fletching Herblore Agility Firemaking Crafting Fishing & Cooking Prayer Correct Drops PvP Point System PvP Point Shops Old School Styled Pest Control Barrows Great Dagganoth Caves Cook's Assistant Quest Slayer Skill with Slayer Gem Working Ice Queen Lair Chaos Elemental King Black Dragon Tzhaar Cave Correct Demon Models All Doors Working All Ladders Working Custom Donator Crown Working Custom Server Name Image in Chatbox New Friends & Ignore Lists ...And much more!
[B][SIZE=4]My Pictures :[/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/29uwryx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/53uyj7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2rdj7eq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2wftgmd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2uo785c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/mwzfk1.png[/img] (Yes i know not the best advert pictures, Im not good with that kind of stuff!)
[B][SIZE=4]Pictures Of Acquittal When It Was Online : (Not Mine) [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i1073.photobucket.com/albums/w383/Alex_Ilhan/RSPS/80bd8715.gif [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0IkqZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SM3nJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8fYWf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/89LL4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sSpYi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BPdy1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S74ub.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/niXKq.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=4]Updates/Fixes :[/SIZE][/B] Added Clue Scroll System Added Correct Drops For (MOST) Monsters Fixed Shop Prices Made a custom quest tab Messed With Combat System(Doesn't stop when fighting anymore) / Monsters Dont Go On Top Of You Started A Custom Quest
[B]I AM NOT FORCING DONATIONS I AM DOING THIS FOR FUN, IF SOMEONE WANTS TO DONATE THEY WILL TALK TO ME AND NOT DONATE FOR ITEMS/SKILLS. ITS JUST TO HELP THE SERVER
I AM ALSO LOOKING FOR A WEB DEVELOPER[/B][/center]
